text: Louis Allen "Lou" Rawls (December 1, 1933 - January 6, 2006) was an American singer. He made over 60 albums. He sold over 40 million copies of them. Rawls was born in Chicago. He was associated with a huge number of rhythm and blues songs. ==References== Category:American blues musicians Category:American gospel musicians Category:American jazz musicians Category:American R&B; singers Category:American soul musicians Category:Singers from Chicago Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Chicago Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:1933 births Category:2006 deaths
title: Lou Rawls
